product_name: REI Chinuka Rain Pants - Women's Petite Sizes
long_description: Thanks to an advanced waterproof/breathable REI Elements(R) shell, women's REI Chinuka Rain Pants in petite sizes offer agility and storm protection for climbing and other active pursuits. REI Elements shell features a durable 4-way-stretch nylon that provides waterproof/breathable coverage and is windproof to 60+ mph. Lower legs have zippers for easy on/off over boots and shoes; a snap tab secures each cuff closure. Scuff guards on inner ankles prevent abrasion from boot heels. Articulated knees enhance mobility. Waistband has a soft tricot lining for added comfort. Secure storage is provided by zip hand pockets and 1 zip rear pocket. Outer zippers on women's REI Chinuka Rain Pants in petite sizes are water resistant.
short_description: Thanks to an advanced waterproof/breathable REI Elements(R) shell, women's REI Chinuka Rain Pants in petite sizes offer agility and storm protection for climbing and other active pursuits.
